Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "As Sniper-PK43's power reboots, his vision is filled with an unfamiliar yet somehow familiar face."}
{3: "The armored girl quickly brushes away the snow that's accumulated on his frame."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, remember Snipey?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sniper', 3: 'I am a fully automated sniping platform, model Sniper-PK43. My name isn\'t "Snipey", though...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This conversation... feels strangely familiar.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You got it, Snipey!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sniper', 3: "...You're not listening at all! But strange how these words feel familiar, too...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another scan of the local database yields no records of this gray-haired girl.'}
{2: 'Sniper', 3: 'You show no signs of infection. May I inquire—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Snipey can finish his preset dialogue line, his visual module swivels sharply, having detected another life signal—'}
{3: "It's been a long time since a human last appeared here."}
{2: 'Sniper', 3: 'Who are you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The automated sniping platform before you blinks with puzzled red lights. Its optical cameras whirr rapidly as they rotate, accompanied by soft electrical buzzing.'}
{2: 'I am the Gray Raven Commandant.', 3: '29', 4: "I am Nanami's friend.", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Sniper', 3: 'The Gray Raven... Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The title rings familiar, but having been offline this entire time, Snipey fails to retrieve any relevant data.'}
{2: 'Sniper', 3: "Nanami's friend...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sniper', 3: 'And who is Nanami?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Argh, I can't believe you don't even remember Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh well, you're forgiven, Snipey! Come on, let's get ready to go now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Snipey remains silent yet involuntarily activates the heating unit beneath its base, as if having performed this action countless times before.'}
{3: "Patting the Snipey's frame impatiently, Nanami raises her weapon with excitement."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alright! Off we go, Commandant, Snipey!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silver waterfowl circle in the winter sky, their gentle calls scattering seeds of hope below.'}
